A draft overview of our planned crawler architecture, and the steps
towards fully implementing it, is available for review.

http://cvs.sourceforge.net/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi/*checkout*/archive-crawler/Design/AOC%20Architecture%20Overview.html?rev=HEAD&content-type=text/html

or:

http://makeashorterlink.com/?S56A523A4

This is meant to be an introduction for new contributors or
potential outside collaborators -- for example, the Nordic
libraries.

Please comment!

- Gordon
